com.palantir.giraffe.file

Class TempPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palantir.giraffe.file.TempPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public final class TempPath
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    A temporary path that is deleted when closed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this path, deleting the file or directory if it exists.
      static TempPath createDirectory()
      Creates a new temporary directory in the default temporary file location.
      static TempPath createDirectory(Path dir)
      Creates a new temporary directory in the specified directory.
      static TempPath createFile()
      Creates a new temporary file in the default temporary file location.
      static TempPath createFile(Path dir)
      Creates a new temporary file in the specified directory.
      Path path()
      Returns the Path to the temporary file or directory.
      String toString() 
      static TempPath wrap(Path path)
      Wraps an existing Path as a TempPath.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createDirectory

        public static TempPath createDirectory()
                                throws IOException
        Creates a new temporary directory in the default temporary file location.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating the directory

                                throws IOException

                           throws IOException
        Creates a new temporary file in the default temporary file location.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating the file

      • createFile

        public static TempPath createFile(Path dir)
                           throws IOException
        Creates a new temporary file in the specified directory.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while creating the file

      • wrap

        public static TempPath wrap(Path path)
        Wraps an existing Path as a TempPath. To allow reasoning about deletion, all access to the delegate path should use the returned wrapper.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to wrap

      • path

        public Path path()
        Returns the Path to the temporary file or directory.

        Clients must take care to avoid leaking the returned reference outside the scope of a surrounding try-with-resources block, as the path is deleted when this object is closed.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this path is closed

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Closes this path, deleting the file or directory if it exists. If this path is already closed, this method has no effect.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while deleting this path

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
